channel.title: Ffs i got crazy!
channel.description:
Ive trie to get admin on my own server in a day now!!!! it won´t work! i go to the server map and then to characters and then double-click my name and you will see this. [ACCOUNT] character-username = **** character-password = ****
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3254 character-posy = 3422 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20070612 character-energy = 3 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 219
Then you see character-right = 0 and i change it to 2 and then i log into my server and when i go back to characters and double click on my name it have been changed back to 0 or its still on 2 but i am not admin! help i get crazy!

I can manually edit char files save works fine for me =]

item.title: Ffs i got crazy!
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

You need to change it while your account is logged out, and if your useing Testscape it won’t let you change you character info.

Read full topic

item.title: Ffs i got crazy!
item.dc:creator: @ebaums_world ebaums world
item.description:
@ebaums_world wrote:

Are you saving it while you are logged out?
If that doesnt work, try to do it while your server is down. Compile and Run.

Read full topic
